Uses of Class
nl.esciencecenter.esight.math.MatF4

  • Packages that use MatF4 
    Package Description
    nl.esciencecenter.esight
    This package contains the most important classes for the eSight Library and is the root package for all the other eSight packages except for the example implementation.
    nl.esciencecenter.esight.experimental
    This package is more of a storage area for currently unused classes that are highly experimental and probably buggy.
    nl.esciencecenter.esight.math
    The matrix/vector math library needed for OpenGL 3.0+ functionality.
    nl.esciencecenter.esight.scenegraph
    Scenegraph functionality implementation, including an octree datastructure.

    • Uses of MatF4 in nl.esciencecenter.esight

      Methods in nl.esciencecenter.esight that return MatF4 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MatF4 ESightGLEventListener.lookAt()
      A helper function that generates a ModelView Matrix based on either the current inputRotationX, inputRotationY and inputViewDistance, or, if an Input event Handler was defined by the constructor, on the viewDist and rotation defined therein.
      MatF4 ESightGLEventListener.perspective()
      A helper function that generates a Perspective Matrix.
